data.name: 洞主
data.text: Re Alice: 我还真没注意是不是，第一次投之后编辑说建议转子刊，老板就转了

data.name: Bob
data.text: Re : 这不是典型的后者么？第二句直接说了unable to accept it。如果是大修应该说的是accept it after major revision。

data.name: Bob
data.text: 如果感觉这个期刊值得就修修再投一次，不值得建议直接投其他的。我之前有一次拒后重投回去，换了个编辑，，，编辑直接拒了，，，

post.text:
万洞求问，文章收到这样的回复，审稿意见是major review还是revise and resubmit呢？

The initial review of your submission is complete. We are unable to accept it, in its present form. However, we are willing to consider a revised version if you can address the concerns and suggestions from the Editorial Office and those in the reviewers' critiques.
